com.github.zk1931.jzab

Class CommitProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.zk1931.jzab.CommitProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestProcessor, Callable<Void>

    public class CommitProcessor
extends Object
implements RequestProcessor, Callable<Void>
    This class is used to deliver committed transaction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommitProcessor

        public CommitProcessor(StateMachine stateMachine,
               Zxid lastDeliveredZxid,
               String serverId,
               Transport transport,
               Set<String> quorumSet,
               com.github.zk1931.jzab.ClusterConfiguration clusterConfig,
               String leader,
               PendingRequests pendings)
        Constructs a CommitProcessor. The CommitProcesor accepts both COMMIT and PROPOSAL message. It puts the PROPOSAL into pendingTxn list and delivers transactions from this list.
        Parameters:
        stateMachine - the state machine of application.
        lastDeliveredZxid - the last delivered zxid, CommitProcessor won't deliver any transactions which are smaller or equal than this zxid.
        serverId - the id of the Participant.
        transport - the Transport object.
        quorumSet - the initial quorum set. It's null on follower's side.
        clusterConfig - the initial cluster configurations.
        leader - the current established leader.
        pendings - the pending requests.
